g.text: Recovery Flow
Client
Server
Email/SMS
Initiate password recovery process with email or phone number
Send password recovery code
Enter password recovery code
Validate code
Issue recovery JWT
Request encrypted master key
Decrypt master key using recovery key from device local storage
Generate authentication key keccak(master key)
Request encrypted private key with authentication key
Retrieve salt and stored authentication key hash
generate authentication key hash PBKDF2(salt: random salt, password: authentication key, iterations: 100000)
Compare generated authentication key hash with stored hash
encrypted private key
prompt for new password (do strength and compromised password checks)
Decrypt private key with master key
Generate 32 byte master key PBKDF2 (salt: keccak(email), password: keccak(password), iterations: 100000)
Generate 32 byte authentication key keccak(master key)
Encrypt private key JSON with master key (AES CBC)
Update authentication key and encrypted private key
generate random salt
generate authentication key hash PBKDF2(salt: random salt, password: authentication key, iterations: 100000)
store encrypted private key JSON, salt and authentication key hash
Done!
